titleInfo.title: Sharḥ tashrīḥ al-aflāk شرح تشريح الأفلاك Sahāranfūrī, ʿIṣmat Allāh ibn Aʿẓam سهارنفوري، عصمة الله بن أعظم and al-Ijābah ʿalá taʿlīq al-Jawnbūrī الإجابة على تعليق الجونبوري Landanī, Ḥusayn لندني، حسين

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Eastern laid paperDimensions: 285 x 170 mm leaf [250 x 100 mm written]Foliation: Eastern Arabic foliation at centre of head margin; India Office Library foliation stamped in black inkRuling: Misṭarah; 15-18 lines per page; vertical spacing 8-9 lines per 10 cmScript: Nasta‘līq; the scribe is Muḥammad Taqī (محمد تقي, see f. 129v, lines 15-17).Ink: Black ink, with rubricated headings and diagrams and overlinings in redDecoration: NoneBinding: Full leather binding, with painted borders and stamped medallion, pendants and corner pieces; sewing supports visible on insides of both boards; original end bandsCondition: Extensive insect damage to boards; minor insect damage to book blockMarginalia: By more than one handSeals: ff. 1r and 145v

mods.abstract: (1) al-Sahāranfūrī (السهارنفوري), Sharḥ tashrīḥ al-aflāk(شرح تشريح الأفلاك; ff. 1r-129v);(2) al-Landanī (اللندني), al-Ijābah ʿalá taʿ līq al-Jawnbūrī(الإجابة على تعليق الجونبوري; ff. 130r-141r).Folios 141r, line 3-145v contain various Persian notes and extracts.
